title: Mike Pence subpoenaed by special counsel overseeing Trump probes: Sources
description: Former Vice President Mike Pence has been subpoenaed by the special counsel overseeing probes into former President Donald Trump, according to multiple sources.

title: Factory employees praised for disarming colleague who shot at, chased co-worker
description: Authorities are praising a group of factory employees they say disarmed a 21-year-old colleague who shot at and chased a co-worker at a boat manufacturing facility.

title: New Jersey leaders mourn councilman killed in workplace shooting
description: New Jersey councilman Russell Heller was fatally shot outside utility company PSE&G's Somerset Central Division Headquarters in Franklin Township on Wednesday.

title: WATCH:  Dad responds after son's teacher tells him only girls have painted nails
description: Christian Shearhod's 3-year-old son came home upset after his teacher told him that only girls have painted nails -- so Shearhod cheered him up by taking him to get a mani-pedi.

title: WATCH:  Cat gets curious with mini pool table
description: Ollie the cat began pawing cue balls into the pockets after seeing a pool table for the first time.

title: Cause found in Keystone Pipeline's massive oil leak
description: A crude oil from the Keystone Pipeline in December in Kansas was caused by a combination of a faulty weld and "bending stress fatigue" on the pipe.

title: Suicides rose in 2021 to highest numbers seen since 2018: CDC
description: A new CDC report published Thursday found the number of suicides increased in 2021 -- after two years of declines -- to figures not seen since 2018

title: Erdoğan slammed over poor quake infrastructure preparation, relief efforts
description: Asli Aydintaşbaş a visiting fellow at the Brookings Institution, spoke with "Start Here" about how Turkey's political situation complicated earthquake relief.

title: Jan. 6 rioter with Confederate flag inside Capitol sentenced to 3 years
description: A federal judge sentenced a Jan. 6 rioter who carried a Confederate flag inside the U.S. Capitol building, to three years in prison on Thursday.

title: State legislator walks back controversial prisoner organ donation proposal
description: A Massachusetts legislator said he's going to amend a bill he introduced that would have given state inmates reduced sentences if they signed up to donate an organ.

title: For New York City mayor, his war on rats becomes personal
description: Every New York City mayor has battled rats

title: Rep. Angie Craig attacked in elevator of her DC apartment building, office says
description: Rep. Angie Craig, D-Minn., was attacked in her Washington apartment building on Thursday morning, her office said later that day

title: Tennessee Senate OKs bill that would restrict drag shows
description: The Tennessee Senate has approved legislation designed to restrict where certain drag shows can take place, marking the latest bill state Republican leaders have advanced targeting LGBTQ people

title: 1 injured in 3-alarm fire in San Francisco, 3 homes impacted
description: At least one person was injured in a massive, three-alarm fire in San Francisco on Thursday, according to the San Francisco Fire Department.

title: Police probe killing of 12-year-old by stolen car's owner
description: Police are investigating a car theft and the fatal shooting of a 12-year-old boy found inside by the car’s owner after an exchange of gun shots over the weekend

title: Church of England allows blessings for same-sex couples
description: The Church of England’s national assembly on Thursday voted to let priests bless same-sex marriages and civil partnerships, while continuing to ban church weddings for the same couples

title: House Oversight Committee, Hunter Biden's attorney exchange letters regarding probe
description: The House Oversight Committee and Hunter Biden's legal team have exchanged their first direct communications as part of the panel's probe into the Biden family.

title: Racist video spurs protest at Catholic high school
description: Two students at a Catholic high school in Philadelphia who allegedly were responsible for a racist video that showed teenage white girls in blackface “are not present in school” and are being disciplined

title: WATCH:  Huge fire breaks out at bus terminal in Philippines
description: A huge blaze broke out at a bus terminal in Quezon City, prompting evacuations at nearby businesses and rerouting buses.

title: WATCH:  6-year-old adorably asks government for 3-day weekend
description: Little Brodie brings up some convincing points.

title: Minnesota factory workers subdue armed person at plant
description: Authorities say workers at a boat factory in Minnesota subdued an armed person who was later taken into police custody

title: Twitter suffers major outage, prompting emergency fix and apology
description: Twitter was down Wednesday. The outage marks one of the largest at Twitter under the leadership of Elon Musk.

title: Halyna Hutchins' parents, sister to sue Alec Baldwin over 'Rust' shooting
description: The parents and sister of Halyna Hutchins, the cinematographer in the "Rust" on-set shooting, plan to file a new lawsuit against Alec Baldwin, their attorney said.

title: Eugene Lee, award-winning Broadway, 'SNL' set designer, dies
description: Eugene Lee, the six-time Emmy Award-winning production designer for “Saturday Night Live” who won three Tony Awards for his Broadway sets, including the complicated, greenified Emerald City of “Wicked,” has died

title: 'It's a mess': Messages to Southwest pilots show meltdown unfolding
description: Southwest Airlines COO Andrew Watterson testifies Thursday before the Senate Commerce Committee about the airline canceling thousands of flights over the holidays.

title: Burt Bacharach, legendary composer of pop songs, dies at 94
description: Popular composer Burt Bacharach has died at 94

title: California reparations efforts eyeing $5 million payments, restitution
description: From $5 million payments to restitution, here's a look into California reparations suggestions.

title: FAA calls on laser manufacturers to warn consumers of risks for planes
description: The FAA wrote to laser manufacturers and distributors on Thursday asking them to add warning labels to their packaging

title: Earthquake hits Indonesia, killing 4 as restaurant collapses
description: A shallow earthquake has shaken Indonesia’s easternmost province of Papua, killing four people who were unable to escape when a floating restaurant collapsed into the sea

title: Barcelona mayor brands Israel apartheid state, cuts ties
description: The mayor of Barcelona has severed her city’s official ties with Israel, accusing the country of “the crime of apartheid against the Palestinian people.”

title: Russian diplomat says ties with US in 'unprecedented crisis'
description: A senior Russian diplomat says that Russia-U.S. relations are in a state of “unprecedented crisis” without any sign of improvement

title: FTX founder keeps talking, ignoring typical legal strategy
description: Sam Bankman-Fried, the founder and former CEO of FTX, has been unusually talkative following the November collapse of the cryptocurrency exchange and his subsequent indictment on fraud and other charges

title: Journalist arrested while reporting on press conference about derailment cleanup
description: Officers from the East Palestine Police Department arrested NewsNation reporter Evan Lambert during a press conference about a train derailment and cleanup efforts.

title: North Korea shows off ICBMs and Kim Jong Un's daughter during military parade
description: North Korea staged a large nighttime military parade on Wednesday possibly showing off the largest number of intercontinental ballistic missiles in one occasion.

title: Biden to warn that Republicans in Congress will 'undermine' Medicare, Social Security
description: While in Tampa on Thursday, President Joe Biden will warn that Republicans will "continue to push plans that would undermine these programs," the White House said.

title: Missing kindergarten teacher found dead in shallow grave close to her home
description: The body of a kindergarten teacher who had been missing since Monday has been found buried in a shallow grave only a few miles away from where she lived and worked.

title: Beijing calls US claims over balloons 'information warfare'
description: China says U_S_ accusations that a downed Chinese balloon was part of an extensive surveillance program amount to “information warfare against China."

title: Zelenskyy wraps up European tour with visit to EU summit
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is wrapping up a whirlwind tour of his major European backers

title: The spy who wasn't? New York police officer wants badge back
description: Prosecutors dropped charges alleging he worked as a foreign agent for China.

title: 1 dead, 5 injured after stolen vehicle collision causes building collapse
description: At least one person is dead and five others injured after a driver in a stolen car slammed into a building and caused it to collapse in an attempt to flee from police.

title: Sen. John Fetterman hospitalized after feeling lightheaded
description: Sen. John Fetterman, D.-Penn., was taken to a Washington hospital on Wednesday "for observation" after feeling lightheaded at a party retreat, his staff said.

title: Sen. John Fetterman hospitalized after feeling lightheaded
description: U.S. Sen. John Fetterman has been hospitalized after feeling lightheaded while attending a Senate Democratic retreat

title: Tornado watch issued in the South, millions of people at risk for severe weather
description: A tornado was spotted just outside of Tangipahoa, Louisiana, Wednesday evening, according to the National Weather Service New Orleans.

title: WATCH:  Stunning aurora dances across Canadian sky
description: The northern lights danced across the night sky of Manitoba, lit up by a full moon in a gorgeous cosmic combination.

title: WATCH:  Entire family rescued from earthquake rubble in Syria
description: Dramatic video shows the miraculous moment an entire family in Syria was rescued from the rubble of their home to the uproarious cheers of those gathered around.

title: DeSantis responds to Trump: 'I don't spend my time trying to smear other Republicans'
description: Trump reshared a social media post insinuating that DeSantis behaved inappropriately around students when he worked as a private school teacher

title: Disney to eliminate 7,000 jobs, CEO Bob Iger says
description: The announcement came on Disney's earnings call on Wednesday.

title: There were over 600 excess deaths in doctors during 1st years of COVID pandemic
description: From March 2020 to December 2021, 622 more physicians died than expected, according to a recently released study.
